name: RE-BOT
description:
THE GAME REQUIRES A KEYBOARD SO PLEASE PLAY IT ON A DESKTOP OR LAPTOP

Use normal arrow keys or W/A/S/D

YOU ARE AMIDST AN APOCALYPSE AND NEED TO PROTECT YOUR VAULT AT ALL COST.

THE BAD BOTS NEED TO BE KILLED

BECAUSE ONLY WITH THEIR SCRAPS YOU CAN CREATE YOUR OWN BOTS TO KILL THE ON-COMING FORCE

Download the game to play if it does not work in the browser for some reason

I have not made all the assets myself. A few of them have been picked from various asset stores for free under legal licenses and have been edited to fit my needs.
